remarks: A partition open interval is a subset of the partitioned open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem27.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR* ) $.
fourierdlem27.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
fourierdlem27.q $e |- ( ph -> Q : ( 0 ... M ) --> ( A [,] B ) ) $.
fourierdlem27.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) $.
fourierdlem27 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Q ` I ) (,) ( Q ` ( I + 1 ) ) ) C_ ( A (,) B ) ) $.
